nodes.text: Lorcu Malshae was a smuggler and captain of the light freighter Moonglow. After losing a lot of money on a deal with Sithless Leethe, Malshae sought to recoup his investment by selling the location of Port Haven to Boba Fett. His Twi'lek co-pilot Par'tha hated the idea and abandoned him. Although Malshae made her promise not to tell anyone about his intentions, Malshae was subsequently killed when the Moonglow exploded over Ord Mantell.
